introduction: In the documentary film 'Testament', you will meet Henry and his brother, both of their time in the dark Jutland waiting for a large inheritance from his family in Germany.The promised inheritance has transformed the two brothers' lives to a standstill waiting room, where time driven by drugs, alcohol, endless discussions and dreamy notions of time with the long-awaited inheritance in the back.But the promise of money results in a true war of the brothers' family, which brings many years of failure and strange events to light.'Testament' won the award, DANISH: DOX, the best Danish film documentary festival CPH: DOX.The film's director, Christian S. Jepsen's first feature length film. He was educated at the Danish Film School in 2007.
